help-file.title: "STORM GIANT"
help-file.content:
Storm Giants are a race of humanoids that are typically three to four feet taller and at least twice as strong as the average human. Although storm giants tend to be a bit slow moving and thinking they are fearsome warriors, feared by most evil races. Storm Giants tend to be good-natured and normally get along well with all the good races of Duris.
Class list: Warrior. Statistics: Extremely strong, huge in size, tend to be slow moving and slightly dim witted. Innate abilities: doorbash, infravision, throw lightning
